#sidebar UserGuideBar

<font color='FF5B00'><h2> EDSM_Count </h2></font>
EDSM Count
<font color='B80028'><h2> syntax </h2></font>
score = EDSM_Count( dfa, positive, negative)
<font color='B80028'><h2> Description </h2></font>
After each merge we use EDSM_Count to caculate the score for a specific <br>
merge. If a negative sample is accpceted or a positive sample is rejected <br>
then the score goes infinitely.
<font color='B80028'><h2> See Also </h2></font>
[EDSM EDSM], [EDSMFold EDSM_FOLD], [EDSMMerge EDSM_MERGE], [EDSMPromote EDSM_PROMOTE]
